name: Hextraction
blurb: Sci-fi RTS on Steam. Build a unique team from a roster of off-world mercenaries to strip planets of their resources. PC/MAC/Linux/OUYA

rewards.reward:
SCOUT
===========================
● Website Credit
===========================
Our thanks to everyone who backs our project with a credit on the Hextraction website.
===========================

PRIVATE
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game
===========================
A copy of the game on the platform of your choice: (1) Steam key for PC, MAC & Linux, (2) DRM-free download for PC, MAC & Linux or (3) OUYA key
===========================
(Approximately €11 / £9)

LANCE CORPORAL
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Beta Access
===========================
+ Get to play the game long before most people by getting access to our early Beta builds.
=========================== (Approximately €15 / £12)

CORPORAL (EARLY BIRD)
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Beta Access ● PDF Art Book ● Original Soundtrack ===========================
Same as "CORPORAL" but save a few dollars as our thanks for being among the first to support our project!
===========================
(Approximately €19 / £16)

CORPORAL 
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Beta Access ● PDF Art Book ● Original Soundtrack ===========================
+ PDF art book detailing a behind the scenes look at the game from it's humble game jam beginning through to the final release! Not to mention a sweet original soundtrack by the talented DJ Dain (Andrew Bowers)
===========================
(Approximately €19 / £16)

SERGEANT
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Beta Access ● PDF Art Book ● Original Soundtrack ● Fleet Pack Skins ● Voting Rights
===========================
Same as "SERGEANT" but save a few dollars as our thanks for being among the first to support our project!
===========================
(Approximately €25 / £21)

SERGEANT
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Beta Access ● PDF Art Book ● Original Soundtrack ● Fleet Pack Skins ● Voting Rights
===========================
+ A Kickstarter exclusive fleet skin texture pack for all of the ships & structures in the game. Plus a private invite to vote on your favourite designs for our major assets as we create.
===========================
(Approximately €25 / £21)

SERGEANT MAJOR
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Beta Access ● PDF Art Book ● Original Soundtrack ● Fleet Pack Skins ● Voting Rights ● Design Randomized Character
===========================
+ Help us design a randomized NPC character the Hextraction crew may encounter throughout the game. We'll send out a survey asking for a suitable name, gender, character type, and physical / gameplay attributes. We'll even send you a downloadable profile sheet.
===========================
(Approximately €32 / £26)

WARRANT OFFICER
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Beta Access ● PDF Art Book ● Original Soundtrack ● Fleet Pack Skins ● Voting Rights ● Design Randomized Character ● Personalized Postcard ● Create Story Element
===========================
+ We'll send you a personalized thank you postcard signed by the team with your customized character printed on it. Plus you'll be given the chance to work with our writer to craft a randomly occurring in-game story event
===========================
(Approximately €48 / £40)

LIEUTENANT
===========================
● Website Credit ● Final Copy of the Game ● Alpha & Beta Access ● PDF Art Book ● Original Soundtrack ● Fleet Pack Skins ● Voting Rights ● Design Randomized Character ● Personalized Postcard ● Create Story Element ● Printed Art Book ● Monthly Q&A Stream
===========================
+ We'll send you a signed printed copy of the art book, invite you to be among the first to play the game by giving access to our alpha builds, as well as invite you to participate in monthly Q&A streams, where we will be showing off the latest features of the game, fielding questions and listening to your feedback! SHIPPING in Canada and USA included, please add $20 anywhere else.
===========================
(Approximately €62 / £51)

CAPTAIN
===========================
● "Lieutenant" Rewards ● 18"x24" signed art print ● Design Alien Artifact
===========================
+ We'll send you a signed poster print as well as give you the opportunity to work with our lead game designer to create a discoverable alien artifact, used either to craft new structures or buff existing ones with special attributes. SHIPPING in Canada and USA included, please add $20 anywhere else.
===========================
(Approximately €98 / £81)

MAJOR
===========================
● "Lieutenant" Rewards ● 18"x24" signed art print ● Design alien creature
===========================
+ The opportunity to work with our lead game designer to design your very own alien creature. What it looks like, what it does, how it attacks, the whole works! Plus, the art print as described in "Captain" tier.
===========================
(Approximately €164 / £136)

COLONEL
===========================
● "Lieutenant" Rewards ● 18"x24" signed art print ● You as a Discoverable Player Character 
===========================
+ You get to be a discoverable player character that the crew can encounter and recruit during the game. Your face, a name of your choice (subject to style approval to fit the game) and pick out gameplay attributes. Also receive the art print as described in "Captain" tier.
===========================
(Approximately €328 / £272)

BRIGADIER
===========================
● "Lieutenant" Rewards ● 18"x24" signed art print ● You as a Crew Member ● Private Launch Party Invite
===========================
+ You get to be a starting crew member! Every time someone starts a new game, they'll get to see your face as a character on the crew selection screen. Give a small back-story, decide what attributes the character has and we'll put you into the game. Also receive the art print as described in "Captain" tier. And an invite to our private launch party!
===========================
(Approximately €657 / £545)

GENERAL
===========================
● "Lieutenant" Rewards ● 18"x24" signed art print ● You as a Mission Captain ● Private Launch Party Invite
===========================
+ Your face as a mission captain! What better way to show how awesome you are than to be among the select few captains available before picking your crew? Give the captain a backstory and help us design what influencers the character has on the crew around them. Also receive the art print as described in "Captain" tier. And an invite to our private launch party!
===========================
(Approximately €1642 / £1362)

CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER ("COO")
===========================
● "General" Rewards ● Design an unlockable Mining Corporation & it's Command Ship ● Private Launch Party Invite
===========================
+ You will be given the opportunity to work with our lead game designer to craft an entire mining corporation and it's command ship. Each corporation is unlocked by the player and will offer special bonuses, attributes and challenges. You help decide what each of those are! And an invite to our private launch party!
===========================
(Approximately €3284 / £2724)

PRESIDENT
===========================
● "COO" Rewards ● Game Title Card in your Likeness ● You voice your Mission Captain ● Help Design a Boss Alien ● Private Launch Party Invite
===========================
+ Your likeness will be used in the game's title card! Help design your own completely custom Mission Captain which will be used as the main branding element for Hextraction and we'll arrange to have your voice in the final game. Additionally help design a boss alien in the game, we might even throw in a custom render of you kicking it's butt for fun too! Plus, an invite to our private launch party.
===========================
(Approximately €5255 / £4358)
